newsitem.title: Finland: METAL SHARES LEAD CAUTIOUS HELSINKI SLIGHTLY UP.
newsitem.headline: METAL SHARES LEAD CAUTIOUS HELSINKI SLIGHTLY UP.

text.p: trade on Wednesday, helped by gains in metal shares after a
rally in Wall Street metal stocks on Tuesday, brokers said.
But the tone remained cautious with eyes on U.S. August
jobless data due on Friday. "The market is still nervous due to
recent volatility in U.S. interest rates," one broker said.
Nokia lost 0.70 markka to 185.80 in moderate trade. Neste
closed quiet trade flat at 97.00 markka after a fall on Tuesday.
Kesko closed 1.00 markka lower at 71.00 markka, with trade
boosted by a big in-house deal in after-hours trade.
